definition.achievementDescription: Kill some Frost Zombies to get ice shards. Ice shards can be crafted into some free magicite!
definition.triggerxml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="advancement_trigger" deletable="false" x="800" y="86"><next><block type="item_in_inventory"><value name="amount_l"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="amount_h"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">64</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:IceShard</field></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
